description: Credit Card Banking Support Agent to assist with Sales And Service, created by Oliver Ivanoski and Steve Green

values: For more information about our Products or Services, simply go to our website. We have a great range to suit your needs. You can also speak to one of our Customer Service Agents.
Should I transfer you now?

notification_display.DisplayText: The virtual assistant can hand off seamlessly to a live agent who can then address the user.

values: For demonstration purposes we don't provide links to other pages. The answers provided are an example of conversational interactions.
You can find out about our exciting employment opportunities on our Employment page.
You can read about our company's history and our commitment to customer service on our About Us page.
You can contacts us on 888-45678.  Our service agents are available from 8am - 9pm, Mon - Fri.
You can contact us on 888-444-555-777.  Our service agents are available from 7am - 8pm, Mon - Fri and 10am - 4pm, Sat.
You can contact us on 888-444-555-888.  Our service agents are available from 7am - 8pm, Mon - Fri and 10am - 4pm, Sat.
You can contact us on 888-111-222-333. Our service agents are available from 7am - 8pm, Mon - Fri.
If you have noticed issues with your customer account you will need to speak to one of our Customer Service agents.
You can add users to your customer account by logging in to your account and clicking on the Manage Users link. Simply follow the prompts to add or modify user details.
Unfortunately I can't help you change your security questions. You will need to talk to one of our Customer Service Agents to assist you.
Unfortunately some details on your account can't be changed. You should talk to one of our Customer Service Agents.
You can create a customer account with us simply by signing up. Simply go to our home page and click on the Create An Account link.
You can change your details online by logging in to your account then clicking on the My Profile link, or you can talk to one of our Customer Service Agents.
You can see your address details by going logging in and clicking on the My Profile link, this will show the details for your customer account.
If you are having issues with your account password, simply click on the Forgot My Password link.
You can see your customer account details by going logging in and clicking on the My Profile link, this will show the information for your customer account.
All accounts have the same access to special deals and rewards - we want to make sure all our customers are happy with their purchases!
Unfortunately I can't help you close an account. You will need to speak to one of our helpful Customer Service Agents.
You can see your account ID by going logging in and clicking on the My Profile link, this will show the details for your customer account.
Not sure? Let's talk a bit more about credit cards.
No? Let's talk a bit more about credit cards.
Yes? Let's talk a bit more about credit cards.
< Initiate Agent Transfer at this point>
Our address is 132 14th Ave. We are open from 9am - 5pm, Mon - Fri.
The branch address is 132 14th Ave.  We are open from 10am - 5pm, Mon - Fri and 10am - 3pm, Sat.
Our $office_location office location is 132 14th Ave.  We are open from 9:30am - 6pm, Mon - Fri.
Our $office_location office location is 132 14th Ave.  We are open from 8:30am - 5pm, Mon - Fri.
Our branch address is 132 14th Ave. We are open from 9am - 5pm, Mon - Fri.
You can visit our social media page on various platforms.
You can contact our service department on the Service email.
We have branches across the country, but our primary offices are in California, Texas, New York and Florida. In which state would you like to call us?
You can message our service department on 1800-123-456-7890.
We have branches across the country, but our primary offices are in California, Texas, New York and Florida. In which state would you like our location details?
You can contact us a number of ways. You can call us, send an email or visit us on our social media page.  How would you like to reach us?
I'm not sure what you mean. I'm still in training and learning more each day to help you with your enquiries.
Let's keep talking, perhaps ask the question in a different way so that I can help you.

dialog_nodes.title: Sample Customized Responses To Assist User

values: I'm not sure what you mean. You may benefit from talking to our Customer Service agents.
Unfortunately I don't have a chance to watch movies as I'm busy doing what I enjoy - answering questions.
I am glad to hear that! We take customer satisfaction very seriously.
I'm sorry to hear that, we take customer satisfaction very seriously. You should talk to one of our helpful Customer Service Agents to help you get the information you need.
A virtual agent (sometimes called a virtual assistant) is an online system designed to help your find information quickly and easily.
Hello!
I love answering questions and making sure you get the information you need!
I love talking about our products and services! Let's talk some more and help you with your questions!
I don't know the time where you are, my system says the time is <? now().reformatDateTime('h:mm a') ?>. But I'd prefer to talk about our products instead.
I'm happy to help!
I am a Virtual Agent. I can help you with questions.
Goodbye, I look forward to helping you again!
Our business hours differ for our offices and our Service Center. How would you like to contact us, via a phone call, or visit our office?

dialog_nodes.title: Determine The Business Hours Contact Channel

values: We have branches across the country, but our primary offices are in California, Texas, New York and Florida. In which state would you like our location details?

dialog_nodes.title: Live Agent Transfer - No Digressions Return

values: Okay, I'll transfer you now.

values.text: Hello, I am the Virtual Agent. I can help you with questions about the organisation.

generic.title: Some of the things I can assist you with are:

options.label: Products and servies we have to offer

input.text: Products and servies we have to offer
